parameters.name: Effect
parameters.description: Specifies whether to allow or deny access.

parameters.name: IdentityType
parameters.description:
The identity type. Valid values:

*   USER
*   CLIENT

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: ID of the Cloud Message Queue MQTT version instance.

parameters.name: PermitAction
parameters.description: The permissions that you want to grant.

parameters.name: Topic
parameters.description: Authorized Topic, supporting multi-level MQTT topics and wildcards.
